songs.title: DJ Drama Intro
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: DJ Drama]
Let me explain something, one thing about a rap game, that's always respected, is authenticism. Yeah you know, niggas runnin' around, speaking the language, saying the terms, talking the talk, but authenticism. Kap G, Like A Mexican. Que pasa homes? Young migo gettin' pesos coming straight outta college park, south side, east point, wassup? Shout out to Mexico. Mr. Thanskgiving, DJ Drama, I wanna welcome y'all to the future. I got my young bulls with me, Blu, Ray G y'all got it from here, real nigga time. Like A Mexican, Kap G, get 'em
